Desde hace quince aos Tomasa se dedica a la elaboracin y venta de comidas, inici este negocio ante la necesidad de obtener un ingreso para cubrir los gastos del hogar sin descuidar a su familia, ella vive en unin libre y tiene tres hijos. Inici ayudndole a un familiar que vende barbacoa, ah aprendi a cocinar y despus se decidi a abrir su propio negocio, poco a poco la demanda por sus productos fue mejorando e incorpor la venta de tacos tambin, obteniendo muy buenos resultados.

En estos momentos Tomasa desea continuar creciendo con su negocio y necesita un prstamo de $ 475 dlares que se compromete a regresar en 6 meses, con esto planea comprar insumos, as como mesas y sillas para ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes. Forma parte del desarrollo de este negocio, Tomasa y su familia agradecen mucho la oportunidad que les brindas de mejorar.

loan.use: Purchase ingredients and remodel

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Invest in different type of seafood

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Increase the size of her store

loan.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria has 10 years of experience in seafood sales, together with her husband, who taught her the business. He worked with his father from the age of 15. After he married Maria, they succeeded in founding their own business. They work every day from 7 am to 2 pm. They catch crabs, cook them, remove the meat and package it to be sold later.

Before borrowing from Mifex, Maria could not meet the demand with of her clients. After receiving a loan several months ago she has been able to significantly increase her production and keep her clients happy. She is now hopeful of taking out a second loan under the Mifex and Kiva partnership.

Maria is 28 years old. She has 4 children, all in school. Her children appreciate their parents for the effort they put into supporting them and giving them the opportunity to study. They hope to buy their own house, since they currently live with Maria's inlaws.

loan.use: Buy a new freezer

loan.name: Mercedes Del Carmen

texts.en:
Mercedes' name merits an explanation. Although it seems to be a long name, it really is a commonly used form to name someone in the Dominican Republic, and in general, in Hispanic cultures. Her second last name, "Del Carmen", is given after the patron saint "Del Carmen Virgin" from the Catholic tradition of having patron "Mother of God" who bears different name depending on where it is that it's used as such. It isn't strange to find that this particular "Virgin" is popular in the island of Puerto Rico. Insofar as her last name is concerned, the "D. L." stands for the origins of her ancestors: the Province of "L." in Spain. Her second last name, R., is as common as the name "Smith" may be in certain parts of the U.S.A.

Mercedes had 9 children, but today she only has one living with her. Her husband died some time ago, and now she must care for her recently injured son. He was procuring the food for their plates, but fell from the motorbike on which he gave rides for a living. He is now living with a cast and theres no certainty as to when or how he will be able to riD. the bike again. Regardless, Mercedes now wants (and as well needs) to put up a cafeteria for which she has most of the utensils (such as the thermos to keep the liquids hot, such as coffee and milk), the toaster for the bread, the blender for the fruit juices, etc. She needs a place to do it in, and needs to buy the raw materials. Hence, shes taking this loan.

She used to have a small grocery store earlier on, but now decided to put up the cafeteria (right where she is standing in the picture) because in the time between when she had the grocery store and now, she feels there have been too many stores put up in the neighborhood. She reminded us that these are good businesses (300% profit margin), but you cant have too many of them close by.

loan.use: Build infrastructure for a cafeteria

loan.name: Ana

texts.es:
Mrs. Ana Romn is 41 years old, has been married since the age of 25 to Mr. Saturnino Domnguez who is 47 years old and who works as a bricklayer in the construction industry. They have three sons of 22, 19 and 17 years old, the oldest of whom works in their parents store and the younger two are students.

Doa Ana is an entrepreneur, and is the owner of a business selling drinks, which she began six years ago with small savings thanks to sacrifices and dedications from both sides that were necessary to open the store. Thanks to this hard work and concessions it is one of the most frequented shops in the area.

Today they are interested in making a venture into the traveling sales of motorcycle parts in addition to selling drinks. Because the construction work her husband is involved in does not bring him much work, this expansion will enable them to have greater profits and provide a better education for her sons. This is the motive behind her request for a loan of $1000 to purchase motorcycle parts to sell such as crowns, chains, fixed wheels and keys.

Translated from Spanish by Chlo Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

La Sra. Ana Romn de 41 aos de edad, est casada hace 25 aos con el Sr. Saturnino Domnguez de 47 aos de edad, de profesin albail (obrero en obras de construccin). El matrimonio tiene 3 hijos de 22, 19 y 17 aos respectivamente, de los cuales el mayor trabaja en el negocio a sus padres y las 2 menores se encuentran estudiando. Doa Ana es una mujer emprendedora, actualmente es propietaria de una casa de bebidas, que se haba iniciado hace 6 aos con un pequeo ahorro que gracias al sacrificio y dedicacin de ambos fueron juntando para poder emprender su negocio, gracias a esto es uno de los ms concurridos de la zona Hoy da estn interesados en incursionarse, adems de su venta de bebidas en venta ambulante de repuestos para motocicleta; ya que las obras de construccin escasean y su marido no tiene mucho trabajo; de este modo generar ms ingresos econmicos para la familia y bridarles una mejor educacin a sus hijos. Por este motivo estn solicitando el prstamo de $1000 para comprar repuestos para la venta tales como corona, cadena, pin y pistn para motocicletas.

loan.use: To purchase motorcycle parts such as crowns, chains, fixed wheels and keys

loan.name: Arminda

texts.es:
Mrs. Arminda is 70 years old, single, and has eight chilren, of whom 7 are female and one male. Four of her daughters live in Argentina for work-related reasons, her three other daughers are married and the son lives with her.

Arminda is from the city of Carapegu, and has a modest house including farm animals such as pigs and cows. She began to work very young; at the age of 15 she worked as an artisan of elaborate tablecloths of "Encaje j" (a characteristic of her area) which her mother taught her to enable her to support herself.

The other activities that help her support her family is the making and selling of starch chips, a typical Paraguayan food made from a base of starch and corn. She sells these with the help of her son on the week-ends at the soccer matches in the area.

She needs this loan in order to purchase large quantities of yarn, in order to increase her production quantities and to give work to her married duaghters that have stayed in Paraguay.

Translated from Spanish by Chlo Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

La seora Arminda, tiene 70 aos de edad, es soltera, tiene ocho hijos, de los cuales siete son mujeres y solo uno es varn. Cuatro sus hijas viven actualmente en Argentina por motivo laborales, tres ya estn casadas y el varn vive con ella. Arminda es de la ciudad de Carapegu, tiene una humilde casa, y cuenta con animales de granja como cerdos y vacas. Empez a trabajar desde muy joven, 15 aos empez como artesana elaborando manteles de Encaje j (tejido caracterstico de la zona), que lo aprendi de su madre quien le dej ese legado eterno para el subsistir diario. Ella cuenta con otra actividad que la ayuda en el sustento de su familia que es la fabricacin y venta de chipa de almidn comida tpica paraguaya hecha en base a almidn y maz, y vende con la ayuda de su hijo los fines de semana en los encuentros de Ftbol de la zona. Necesita el crdito para compra de hilo en cantidad, de manera a aumentar su produccin, y dar trabajo a sus hijas casadas que quedaron en Paraguay.

loan.use: Purchase large quantities of colorful yarn

loan.name: Carmen Rita

texts.en:
Carmen is working to get a 'license' from the wholesaler of "Safire" brand beauty aids in order to sell them via cataloged presentations. With the returns she expects to make out of the sale of these products, she plans to be able to sustain herself together with a now six-month-old child. The father abandoned her, and she must now make it on her own! She lives with her family, as she has no means of getting a house, but her family is as poor as can be, so Carmen needs to come up with at least the basics to maintain herself and the childs food, clothing and transportation needs.

Carmen tells us that she's realized she needs to go back to school to become a professional, so that's another reason why she needs to earn 'as much as the business will afford'. She wouldn't say the profit margin on the beauty aids selling business, but normally it's something in the neighborhood of 100%, so she will probably do well, and start her schooling days in January, as she is now planning to do!

loan.use: To buy "Safire" brand beauty aids sold under cataloged presentations.

loan.name: Ciriaco

texts.es:
Ciriaco is 37 years old, and happily married for more than 12 years to Juana Bentez who is 36 years old. They have four children who are all students. Since a very young age Ciriaco began to work with his father in the manufacturing of balls (for sports activities) where he learned all the necessary skills for what he works in today. Thanks to this work he is able to provide the necessities for his family. After many years of working, he was able to little by little acquire his own independent set of tools. For the last 15 years, Mr. Ciriaco has been one of the princiapl providers of balls to sports facilities in the area.

He is asking for a loan in order to purchase leather and paints as his sales have increased recently and he needs to expand this part of the production.

Translated from Spanish by Chlo Tuot, a Kiva Volunteer.

Ciriaco tiene 37 aos, est felizmente casado hace mas de 12 aos con Juana Bentez de 36 aos, con quien tiene 4 hijos todos en edad escolar. Desde muy joven comenz a trabajar con su padre como ayudante en la fabricacin de pelotas all fue donde aprendi esta actividad que hoy constituye su actividad principal, gracias a esto le est brindando la atencin necesaria a su familia; despus de trabajar mucho tiempo poco a poco fue adquiriendo sus propias herramientas independizndose hace 15 aos, el Sr Ciriaco es uno de los principales proveedores de pelotas a las casas deportivas de la zona Solicita el prstamo para la compra de cuero y pintura ya que las ventas han aumentado satisfactoriamente en estos ltimos tiempos y necesita aumentar de esta forma la produccin

loan.use: Purchase leather and paints

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Buy a glass display case

loan.name: Rita Elena

texts.en:
Rita lives with her father and mother, where her sister also moved in when her husband abandoned them. The only difference is that Rita has 4 kids (depicted in the picture) and she needs to assist her husband (a fresh produce salesman himself) to supply their needs to make a living.

Rita would like to "become a professional", meaning that she would like to have the opportunity to go to school and earn some degree, but we explained that "professionalism" doesn't come from degrees so much as from "doing well whatever one does" for a living! This seemed to enlighten her otherwise somber-looking composure, obviously stemming from the heavy load of having to care for such a large and growing family at this stage of their lives.

She figures that she will no have much time to do her selling activity, thus she chose to sell shoes and the like, which bodes well with her needs of tending to her children and those around her. All of the kids that live under the same roof now (8 at this time) will need some kind of footwear, so this is a good place to start 'selling', and she plans to continue doing so in the close-by neighborhood.

A 200% profit margin should allow Rita to be able to repay her loan and obtain the benefits of assisting herself in caring for the children. The market, at least in terms of number of kids, is certainly there.

loan.use: Start a business by selling shoes for men, women and children.

loan.name: Daisy

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
Daisy Patricia is 20 years old, is unmarried mother of one of 8 months of age. She lives with her parents and brother.She sells sweet cakes and Paraguayan soup (it is a typical food of Paraguay that is made with maize flour, eggs, milk). From very young she learned from her mother since they came from a very humble family and the little . With time Daisy acquired experience and at the moment all their neighbors of the district consider her an expert in the culinary arts.
Each afternoon she crosses the District Apua Valley, a district of Asuncio'n and its neighborhoods with a product tray (their clients already wait for the moment to taste). The Lady wishes to use the loan to buy ingredients like eggs, cheeses, flour of maize, milk and also to be able to acquire trays for better presentation of its products this way will be able to increase its sales to obtain a greater margin of profit.
The lady belongs to the Group "Kua Katypyry" that means "Intelligent Woman" and comprises of the Program Committee of Enterprising Women of the Paraguayan Foundation, that consists of 16 women who to conform a shared in common group of work.
ORIGINAL SPANISH Daisy Patricia tiene 20 aos, es madre soltera de una beba de 8 meses de edad, vive con sus padres y hermanos, se dedica a la venta de tortas dulces y sopa Paraguaya (es una comida tpica de Paraguay que est hecha a base de harina de maz, huevos, leche). Desde muy nia aprendi el oficio de su madre ya que provenan de una familia muy humilde y el poco ingreso que obtenan no les alcanzaba para cubrir con todas sus obligaciones. Con el tiempo Daisy fue adquiriendo experiencia y actualmente todas sus vecinas del barrio la consideran como una experta en el arte culinario. Todas las tardes recorre el Barrio Valle Apua, un barrio de Asuncin y sus alrededores con su bandeja de productos (sus clientes ya esperan el momento para degustar la merienda con sus ricos productos). La Seora desea utilizar el crdito para comprar ingredientes como huevos, quesos, harina de maz, leche y tambin poder adquirir unas bandejas para mejor presentacin de sus productos de esta manera podr aumentar sus ventas para obtener un mayor margen de utilidad. La seora pertenece al Comit Kua Katypyry nombre en guaran que significa "Mujer Inteligente" y forma parte del Programa Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras de la Fundacin Paraguaya, que consta de 16 mujeres que conformar un grupo solidario de trabajo.

loan.use: huevos, quesos, harina de maz, leche y tambin y varias bandejas.

loan.name: Agapito

texts.en:
Agapito sells crab meat to the local community and nearby restaurants. He has been working with seafood for over 15 year. He gets up at 4 every morning to buy crabs from fishermen. He and his wife then spend the next couple of hours cooking the crab and removing the crab meat. He puts the meat in plastic containers and then sells it to the public.

His previous loan with our institution helped him increase his production and target the small restaurants in his area. He was very grateful for the opportunity he received, but is not satisfied. He hopes to invest in new tools that will help him be more efficient and lower prices. He hopes he can provide crab meat to many more restaurants in his area.

He and his wefe have 3 kids who are all in school and often help out in the business. His wife is a housekeeper who works in the city. Their short term goal is to fix their home before the rainy season gets bad. Currently their roof leaks and it is very vulnerable to heavy rains.

loan.use: Buy tools to increase his productivity

loan.name: Lus

texts.en:
Since he was 15 years old, Lus had always liked animals. He raised chickens, ducks and pigeons in his house. His neighbors already knew him and began to buy these animals from him. When Lus got married, he continued to work on his business and also specialized in raising exotic animals such as doves, hens and peacocks. He already has a steady stream of clients and places to exhibit his animals, where he also delivers them.

The pens are in the backyard of his house and he checks and attends to the animals daily. Every weekend, Lus goes to the market and stores to offer his products. Besides this activity, Lus cooks at the community kitchens starting from 5:00 PM. These are his only sources of income.

Lus improved the structure of his pens implement a cleaning out system with a previous loan he received. He is now hopeful that he can invest in more exotic types of birds and poultry that are more profitable than the ones he raises now.

He is 37 years old, married with 3 children. His wife works at a company and supports him with the household expenses. Together they have been able to acquire their posessionsespecially the house which they have changed from a house made of cane to a cement one. Theirs is a hard-working and humble family; his wishes are for his children to be able to finish school and so to have their incomes from work to help the family.

loan.use: Buy different types of birds

loan.name: Epifania

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
Epifania is 47 years old, is dedicated to the kitchen, happily married to Pablo Joaquin Carmona of 51 years who is assistant of mechanics in a great transport company in the city. They live in the District Apua Valley a district on Asuncio'n. They have 7 children, the oldest daughter is the one who helps with the making and sale of their products and the other children are very young.
Epifania makes each afternoon the Paraguayan soup (a typical food of the country done with flour of maize, cheese and milk), biscochos and cakes by orders. Her oldest daughter is the one in charge of the sales and she does crossing the streets, arriving house by house offering his products which very are accepted by the inhabitants of the zone. This office learned it of its mother from small and Mrs. Epifania teaches all to her daughters the secrets of her kitchen.
The lady wishes to use the loan to buy ingredients like: flour, butter, milk, cheeses, eggs, sugar, and candies, stop of this form to increase the demand of sales and thus to obtain a greater margin of profit the lady belongs to the Group "Kua Katypyry" of the Program Group of Enterprising Women that consists of 16 women who share in common work.
ORIGINAL SPANISH Epifania tiene 47 aos, se dedica a la cocina y repostera, est felizmente casada con Pablo Joaqun Carmona de 51 aos quien es ayudante de mecnica en una empresa grande de transporte de la ciudad. Viven en el Barrio Valle Apua un barrio de Asuncin. Tienen 7 hijos, la mayor de sus hijas es quien la ayuda con la elaboracin y venta de sus productos y los dems hijos son menores de edad. Epifania elabora por las tardes la sopa paraguaya (una comida tpica del pas hecha a base de harina de maz, queso y leche), biscochos y tortas por pedidos. Su hija mayor es la encargada de las ventas y lo hace recorriendo las calles, llegando casa por casa ofreciendo sus productos los cuales son muy aceptados por los habitantes de la zona. Dicho oficio lo aprendi de su madre desde pequea y la seora Epifania ensea a todas sus hijas los secretos de su cocina. La seora desea utilizar el crdito para comprar ingredientes como: harina, manteca, leche, quesos, huevos, azcar, y dulces, para de esta forma aumentar la demanda de ventas y as lograr un mayor margen de utilidad La seora pertenece al Comit Kua Katypyry del Programa Comit de Mujeres Emprendedoras que consta de 16 mujeres que conformar un grupo solidario de trabajo.

loan.use: para comprar harina, manteca, leche, quesos, huevos, azcar, y dulces

loan.name: Luisa Angelica

texts.en:
Rita has had 7 children, 6 girls and 1 boy. She now lives with her husband and 3 children ( girls), and wishes to be able to make her children go to school and "become professionals". She, as well, states that she would like to finish high school. In fact, she mentioned she would try to get herself enrolled in the local school within the next few days, as this is a long-time aspiration of hers! (She failed school when she was in 8th grade, and would need to start this grade all over again.)

Luisa presently sells some $45 worth of personal home products a week. They are normally ordered via catalog, so she doesn't have to have a large inventory, but does have to manage a credit portfolio. Normally she can't buy more product than what she's collected, so her cash flow is limited to precisely the amount she sells, generally speaking. With the added cash from the loan, she expects to be able to increase her earnings some 3 times her actual figures.

loan.use: Buy additional products to sell

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Improve her store

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Buy Merchandise

loan.name: Severo

texts.es:
Business Description

Mr. R. sells disinfectants and general home cleaning products; he also prepares colognes and perfumes. He started this business after having learned how produce these products through a course he made. At present he is selling all kinds of fungibles.

Loan Use

He will be use the loan to buy more raw materials in order to be able to increase his production since he has gained a lot of clients due to the good quality of his products and the low selling price.

Personal Information

He is 43 years old. He is married and has three children who are in school. His house is made of cane. His main goal is to improve his business to secure the education of his children.

Translated from Spanish by Ana Gabriela Clark, Kiva Volunteer.

Descripcin del Negocio

El cliente se dedica a la venta de desinfectantes y productos de limpieza del hogar en general, adems elabora colonias y perfumes. Comenz este negocio despus de haber aprendido a elaborar estos productos por medio de un curso que realizo. Actualmente tiene a la venta todo tipo de fungibles

Uso del Prstamo

El usara el crdito para comprar mas materia prima y as poder aumentar su produccin pues sus clientes han aumentado debido a la buena calidad de sus productos y al bajo costo en que los vende

Informacin Personal

El tiene 43 aos de edad esta casado y tiene tres hijos que estudian su casa es de caa. Su principal meta de mejorar su negocio para asegurar la educacin de sus hijos.

loan.use: Buy raw materials to manufacture his home cleaning products

loan.name: Atanasia

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
Mrs. Atanasia emigrated 20 years ago from city in the interior called Caazap. She is married tp Yellow Ismael, who is employed in the sale of footwear. The pair has 5 children, three women and two men, all of them already have finished its secondary studies and nowadays they work of independent, except one, who aids in taking care of the business.
All in the family collaborate in paying the expenses of the home. Their store is has been in existence since 1992 in a very populated district of the city of Luque. With the aid of one of their daughters to take care of the business. The successive loans that it has obtained from the Paraguayan Foundation allowed them to improve their store in buying the furniture and the merchandise that it sells. The loan that it asks for will invest it in buying sugar, rice, meat, vegetables and other merchandises that they greatly need.
ORIGINAL SPANISH La seora Atanasia emigr hace 20 aos de una ciudad del interior llamado Caazap, ella est casada con Ismael Amarilla, quien se dedica a la venta de calzados. La pareja tiene 5 hijos, tres mujeres y dos hombres, todos ellos ya han terminado sus estudios secundarios y hoy da trabajan de forma independiente, excepto una, quien la ayuda atendiendo el negocio. Todos en la familia colaboran para la manutencin del hogar. Su despensa se halla funcionando desde el ao 1992 en un barrio muy populoso de la ciudad de Luque. Sus mercaderas son bien surtidas y sus clientes son vecinos del lugar. Cuenta con la ayuda de una de sus hijas para atender el negocio. Los sucesivos crditos que ha obtenido de la Fundacin Paraguaya le permiti mejorar su despensa desde comprar el mobiliario y las mercaderas que ella vende. El prstamo que solicita lo invertir en comprar carbn en cantidad, azcar, arroz, carne, verduras y otras mercaderas de primera necesidad.

loan.use: Compra de carbn en cantidad, azcar, arroz, carne, verduras

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Purchase additional items for her beauty shop and expand her business

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Buy more merchandise

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Buy kitchen utensils, tables, chairs

loan.name: Dora

texts.es:
Dora is 31 years old and married to Ramn Ferrerira, an automechanic. They have one son, who is currently studying in a neighborhood primary school.

Dora sells silver and gold jewelry such as rings, hoop earrings, chains, necklaces and other kinds of jewelry. She sells door-to-door for cash and on credit. She also makes clothing for children in "Ao poi ", a handcrafted fabric with needlework typical of Paraguay, to order. Her clients are teachers, neighbors, business people and on occasion, clients who live in the cities of Luque, Aregu Limpio and San Lorenzo, some 20 km from Dora's home.

Dora has been selling jewelry for 3 years; she started her business with the financial help of the Fundacin Paraguay. She and her husband are poor and self-made people with a strong sense of responsibility when it comes to paying their bills and loans. With their earnings from the jewelry and the auto repair businesses, they have been able to grow and educate their family. The loan will be used to buy jewelry to sell.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Dora tiene 31 aos, est casada con Ramn Ferreira quien es mecnico de autos. Tienen 1 hijo que actualmente realiza sus estudios primarios en una escuela del barrio.

Ella se dedica a la venta ambulante de joyas de plata y oro como anillos, aros, cadenas, collares, diges y otros. Sus ventas las realiza al contado y a crdito, tambin confecciona ropas para nios en Ao poi (tejido artesanal tpico del Paraguay) sobre pedido. Sus clientes son docentes, vecinos, comerciantes y ocasionales clientes que viven en las ciudades de Luque, Aregu, Limpio y San Lorenzo distantes a unos 20 km de su casa.

A esta actividad se dedica desde hace 3 aos. Obteniendo desde el principio la ayuda financiera de la Fundacin Paraguaya. Son personas muy humildes pero con mucha moral de pago que con lo obtenido por la venta de las joyas y por las reparaciones de vehculos que hace su marido han podido criar y educar a su familia. El prstamo lo solicita para la compra de joyas para la venta.

loan.use: Buy jewelry to sell

loan.name: Mirella

texts.es:
Business Description

Mirella has 10 years of experience as a seamstress. She worked with her mother, which is how she learned her trade. Two years ago she started her own business and with the help of some money her husband saved she was able to buy the raw materials she needed to open her business. Mirella specializes in school uniforms and flags. Her workshop is in her home and she works Monday through Saturday from 8:00am until 7:00pm.

Loan Use

Mirella will use the loan to purchase more raw materials, such as leather and fabric. There is much demand for her work right now, particularly for sports uniforms as many schools will be celebrating their schools Olympic games and have placed orders with Mirella. She would also like to use some of the loan money to purchase materials in order to make improvements on her home and workshop.

Personal Information

Mirella is 30 years old. She is married but has no children. Her husband is a security guard at a clinic and therefore also contributes toward household expenses. They live in a little house made of cane and wood given to them by her mother. They are working hard to be able to reconstruct the house, which is in a fairly unstable condition. Mirella hopes to grow her business and continue improving the quality of her life.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Kenney Molloy, Kiva volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

Mirella tiene 10 aos de experiencia en esta actividad. Ella trabajaba con su mam y fue as como aprendi este trabajo y hace 2 aos ella se independizo y con un dinero que le dio su esposo empez a comprar su propia materia prima. Mirella hace todo lo que es uniformes para las escuelas y porta estandarte de las banderas. Ella tiene su taller en su domicilio y trabaja de lunes a sbado desde las 8:00am hasta las 7:00pm.

Uso del Prstamo

Ella desea con el crdito comprar materia prima como cuero y telas ya que en este tiempo tiene bastante demanda de uniformes deportivos ya que muchas escuelas estn celebrando las olimpiadas escolares y le han hecho pedidos de uniformes. Adems que va a usar algo del crdito para compra materiales para mejorar su vivienda.

Informacin Personal

Mirella tiene 30 aos y esta casada pero no tiene aun hijos, su esposo es guardia de seguridad en un clnica y percibe tambin un ingreso que le permite aportar para los gastos del hogar. Ellos tienen su casita de caa y madera que le dio su mam y juntos estn trabajando duro para poder construir su casa ya que las condiciones son muy precarias. Ella aspira crecer con su negocio y a su vez ir mejorando su calidad de vida.

loan.use: Purchase fabric to increase her production

loan.name: Jess

texts.es:
Business Description

Mrs. Jess Mara has 2 years of experience in business. 8 months ago, her son-in-law lent her some money and she decided to start her business, where she sells diapers, juices, sodas, cookies, notebooks, etc. She works Monday through Friday from 6:00 am until 5:00 pm, and on weekends from 9:00 am until 6:00 pm. Her business is located in her home.

Loan Use

Mrs. Jess wants this loan to buy more merchandise, such as diapers, school supplies, and juices. She also wants to start selling gift items, since her business is located across from a school and she has a lot of demand for her products.

Personal Information

Mrs. Jess Mara is 48 years old, she is married and has 5 children, all older. Her husband is a door-to-door vendor and he also contributes to the household expenses, and 2 of her children are single and live with her. Her home is made of cement, with 2 stories, and they are finishing constructing it. She is a woman who is making a great deal of effort to get ahead with her family, and she aspires to grow with her business as her loans generate greater utility and in that way to have a better way of life.

(Translated from the Spanish by Naomi Johnson, Kiva volunteer)

Descripcin del Negocio

La Sra. Jess Mara tiene 2 aos de experiencia en el comercio hace 8 meses su yerno le presto un dinero y ella decidi poner su negocio donde vende paales, jugos, colas, galletas, cuadernos etc. Ella atiende su negocio de lunes a viernes de 6:00am hasta las 17:00pm y los fines de semana de 9:00am hasta las 18:p.m. Su negocio esta ubicado en su domicilio.

Uso del Prstamo

La Sra. Jess desea el crdito para comprar ms mercadera como paales, tiles escolares, y jugos, adems que desea poner a la venta artculos de regalos, ya que su negocio esta ubicado frente a una escuela y tiene bastante demanda de sus productos.

Informacin Personal

Doa Jess Mara tiene 48 aos de edad, esta casada y tiene 5 hijos, todos mayores de edad. Su esposo es comerciante ambulante y tambin aporta para los gastos de la casa al igual que 2 de sus hijos que son solteros y viven con ella. Su casa es de cemento de 2 pisos y estn terminando de construirla. Ella es una mujer muy esforzada por sacar adelante a su familia y aspira crecer con su negocio a medida que sus crditos le generen mayor utilidad y a si tener un mejor modo de vida.

loan.use: To invest in much more merchandise

loan.name: Emilia

texts.es:
Business Description

Sra. Emilia has 40 years of experience in her industry -- from a very young age she has been involved in business. Two years ago, she decided to open a stall to sell breakfast in a market near her neighborhood with savings from money her children have given her. She works from 6:00 a.m. until 1:00 p.m.

Loan Use

Sra. Emilia would like a loan to purchase utensils for her kitchen. The ones she has been using are quite old and have lost their usefulness. She would also like to purchase some tables and chairs to provide better service to her customers.

Personal Information

Sra. Emilia is 66 years old. She is a widow and has three adult children. She lives in a very simple one-story home made of cement with her daughter who works outside the home and whom she helps with the household expenses. Doa Emilias wish is to make improvements, little by little, to her home. Currently, her home has a dirt floor.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Kenney Molloy, Kiva volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

La Sra. Emilia tiene 40 aos de experiencia en le negocio, ella desde muy pequea se dedicaba al comercio. Hace 2 aos decidi poner un puesto de venta de desayunos en un mercado cerca del sector donde ella vive con un dinero que fue ahorrando de lo que sus hijos le daban. Ella trabaja desde las 6:00am hasta las 13:00pm.

Uso del Prstamo

La Sra. Emilia desea el crdito para comprar utensilios para cocina, ya que los que actualmente tiene ya terminaron su tiempo de vida til. Ella adems quiere comprar un juego de mesas y sillas para darles un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Informacin Personal

La Sra. Emilia tiene 66 aos de edad, es viuda y tiene 3 hijos todos mayores de edad. Su casa propia y es de cemento de 1 piso y muy sencilla. Ella actualmente vive con una hija que trabaja y le ayuda con los gastos del hogar. El anhelo de doa Emilia es ir mejorando poco a poco su vivienda ya que el piso es de tierra.

loan.use: Purchase new utensils, tables and chairs.

loan.name: Evangelina

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
The Lady. Evangelina E. is 26 years old is married to Mr. Milciades Vzquez that is 29 years old. They are parents of two children smaller than not yet they are at schooling age. They live in very populated district on called Luque Gorge San Rafael, where they have has a store for 2 years.
They sell meat, rice, panificados, milky, drinks, grass, etc. and she thus provides all the neighbors to them with the district. She and their husband from their beginnings have been clients of the Paraguayan Foundation obtaining loans for the purchase of bookcases and of the different merchandises that sell in their store; in that way they were growing and extending the business. In addition her husband counts on a stable work in a sugar factory making a wage that helps to deal with the expenses of the house. He asks for the loan to buy more merchandises like tinned products, flour, oil, milk, vegetables, etc.
ORIGINAL SPANISH La Seora. Evangelina E. tiene 26 aos est casada con el seor Milciades Vzquez quien tiene 29 aos, ellos son padres de dos hijos menores que an no estn en edad escolar. Viven en barrio muy populoso de Luque llamado Caada San Rafael, donde tiene montado su despensa desde hace 2 aos. Ellos venden carne, arroz, panificados, lcteos, bebidas, yerba, etc. y les provee as a todos los vecinos del barrio. Ella y su marido desde sus inicios han sido clientes de la Fundacin Paraguaya obteniendo crditos para la compra de estanteras y de las diferentes mercaderas que venden en su despensa; de esa forma fueron creciendo y ampliando el negocio. Adems su marido cuenta con un trabajo estable en una azucarera percibiendo un salario que ayuda a enfrentar los gastos de la casa. Solicita el crdito para comprar ms mercaderas como productos enlatados, harina, aceite, leche, verduras, etc.

loan.use: para comprar ms mercaderas como productos enlatados, harina, aceite, leche, verduras, etc.

loan.name: Julia

texts.es:
Business Description

Julia has 6 years of experience in this type of work. She used to work at the snack bar of a school, where little by little she was saving her money. Not being close to her children motivated her to start this business in her home. She attended classes at a bakery where she acquired the knowledge and she created her shop. She supplied her shop with other types of products, such as candy and now housewares and gifts. She works every day of the week from 6 a.m. until 9 p.m. Her children help her serve her customers and in making the bakery products.

Loan Use

The loan will be invested in the purchase of merchandise for her store. She will supply it with candy, housewares and gifts, and also with the ingredients for making her bread.

Informacin Personal

Julia is 43 years old and she is a single mother. She has 2 children who are already adults. One of them helps her look after the business, and the other works at a gas station as a gas pumper. Her house is made of cane. Thanks to her work, she has succeeded in giving her children education and nutrition. She hopes, with this investment, she will be able to continue improving the life of her family.

(Translated from the Spanish by Naomi Johnson, Kiva volunteer)

Descripcin del Negocio

Julia tiene una experiencia de 6 aos en esta actividad. Ella trabajaba en el bar de una escuela donde poco a poco fue haciendo sus ahorritos. El no estar cerca de sus hijos la motivo a poner un negocio en su domicilio. Asisti a cursos de panadera de donde adquiri el conocimiento y puso su local. Surti su local con otra clase de productos. Como lo son confites y actualmente artculos de bazar. Trabaja todos los das de la semana en horario de 6 a.m. hasta las 9 p.m. Sus hijos les ayudan con el servicio a sus clientes y en la elaboracin de sus productos para la panadera.

Uso del Prstamo

El crdito lo invertir en compra de mercadera para su local. Surtirlo con productos de confites y artculos de bazar. Adems de materia prima para la elaboracin de sus panes.

Informacin Personal

Julia tiene 43 aos y es madre soltera. Tiene 2 hijos los cuales ya son adultos. Una le ayuda con la atencin del negocio. Y el otro trabaja en una gasolinera como despachador de combustible. Su casita es de caa. Gracias a su trabajo ha logrado darles educacin y alimentacin a sus hijos. Espera con la inversin que realizara poder seguir mejorando la vida de su familia.

loan.use: To diversify the merchandise in her shop.

loan.name: Felipe

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
Mr. Felipe is 47 years old, iand s widower for 5 years. Helives with his 3 children in the district Makai de Luque. For more than nine years he has been dedicating himself to the animals for the at his house -- like pig, duck, goats, hens and cows for the sale.
Also he sells cow milk and goat milk. He provides to his neighbors the slaughters at the central market of the city. Their daughters dedicate themselves to the tasks of the house. Don Felipe also works by the nights as guard of security in a house and by day makes in order to have sufficient funds to maintain the family. The loan that he asks for he wishes it to invest in the purchase of balanced animals and as well as in the improvement of the corrals of the animals.
ORIGINAL SPANISH El seor Felipe tiene 47 aos, es viudo desde hace 5 aos, vive con sus 3 hijos en el barrio Makai de Luque. Desde hace ms de nueve aos se dedica a la cra de animales para la venta en su casa, como cerdo, pato, cabras, gallinas y vacas para la venta. Tambin vende leche de vaca y de cabra, provee a sus vecinos y a carniceras del mercado central de la ciudad. Sus hijas se dedican a los quehaceres de la casa. Don Felipe tambin trabaja por las noches como guardia de seguridad en una casa particular y de da realiza en su casa sus actividades cotidianas para poder tener suficiente ingreso para mantener la familia. El crdito que solicita lo desea invertir en la compra de animales y de balanceados as como en la mejora de los corrales de los animales.

loan.use: compra de animales y de balanceados as como en la mejora de los corrales de los animales.

loan.name: Lesbia Marina

texts.es:
I sell clothing to people of very low economic resources. I have been working in this business for several years. Some people cannot buy new clothes because they do not earn much. My sales are strong on the weekends since people come from nearby communities to the city of San Lorenzo. I now need to buy several bundles of used clothing because my inventory is small and I want to increase my sales and provide better service. Thank you for your help with my business.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

I of clothes on sale used to people of vajos economicos resources am east business already several years old, dico that cannot go to one must to buy new clothes since their income are very low. My sales are very strong the week ends since many people come from other near communities to buy to the ciuda of San Lorenzo. Now nesecito to buy several fardos of clothes since I have remained with less clothes and I want to aunmentar my sales and to give a good service. Thanks to its aid my gracido business to.

loan.use: To buy used clothing

loan.name: Gladys

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
Mrs. Gladys is 40 years old and is married to Mr. Juan Horseman with whom they have 3 children, a woman and two men of 23, 20 and 13 years respectively, all students. Her oldest daughter already has started university which has brought a greater cost for the family. So Gladys decided to help to her husband with the expenses and opened its own pantry of way to have a business that generates more income. His husband dedicates himself on traveling sales of various merchandise.
It's been 5 years since they opened this store, and then they decided for the first time to take loans from the Paraguayan Foundation. By means of the contribution of Gladys and the pantry, their children nowadays can continue studying without no disadvantage. This store is very successful from the neighbors, because it is well assorted. They wishe for a new loan to be able to buy more merchandise to by greater like rice, oil, sugar, etc.
ORIGINAL SPANISH La seora Gladys tiene 40 aos y est casada con el seor Juan Caballero con quien tiene 3 hijos, una mujer y dos varones de 23, 20 y 13 aos respectivamente, todos estudiantes. Como su hija mayor ya tena que empezar la universidad lo que implicaba un gasto mayor para la familia, Gladys decidi ayudar a su marido con los gastos y abri su propia despensa de modo a tener un negocio que genere ms ingresos. Su marido se dedica a la venta ambulante de mercaderas varias. Ya pasaron cinco aos desde que abri su despensa, y en ese momento que recurri por primera vez a los crditos de la Fundacin Paraguaya. Mediante el aporte de Gladys con la ganancia que deja la despensa sus hijos hoy da pueden seguir estudiando sin ningn inconveniente. Su despensa tiene mucho xito entre sus vecinos, porque la misma est bien surtida. Ella desea un crdito nuevo para poder comprar ms mercaderas al por mayor como arroz, aceite, azcar, etc.

loan.use: Compra de mercadera como arroz, aceite, azcar, etc.

loan.name: Luz Marina

texts.en: I have had a small Grocery Store( pulperia) for 7 years. I have good customers; all my neighbors buy and other people from other communities. Now I need to provide more products in the store. This business allows me to help my family with monthly expenses.

loan.use: Buy products such as rice, sugar, juice, beans, bread, coffee, disinfectant

loan.name: Julia

texts.es:
TRANSLATED BY MATT FLANNERY
Mrs. Julia, is 59 years of age, is unmarried and has three children; two twins of 29 years of age, both educated, are married and independent, and the son of 26 years lives with her.
Julia is dedicated to the sale of artisan crafts by traveling, crossing house tp house, mainly table cloths of ao poi (woven typical Paraguayan. She has been at it 10 years and learned from her mother. Soon with time they have profit and have independence thanks to effort and sacrifice.
Nowadays, thanks to their figting spirit they have a beautiful house with all the comforts, fulfilled their dream to educate their children and give a roof where they live. The success can be attributed to perserverance, and also the good administration that she herself lends to her business.
They need the loan to construct a room next to the house to be able to bring their mother to live with them so they can work together in the making of the crafts because she is living now 20 km from the city of Carapegu.
ORIGINAL SPANISH La seora Julia, tiene 59 aos de edad, es soltera y tiene tres hijos; dos de ellas mellizas que tienen 29 aos de edad, ambas son docentes, casadas e independientes, y el varn de 26 aos vive con ella.
Julia se dedica a la venta de artculos artesanales a crdito de forma ambulante, recorriendo casa por casa, principalmente sobrecamas y manteles de ao poi (tejido tpico paraguayo) Se haba iniciado como tejedora de sobrecamas desde los 10 aos que lo aprendi de su madre con quien trabajo realizando esta actividad durante varios aos. Luego con el tiempo logro su independencia gracias a su esfuerzo y sacrificio, saliendo ella misma a vender lo que producan obteniendo mayores utilidades.
Hoy da gracias a su espritu de lucha tiene una hermosa casa con todas las comodidades, cumpli con su sueo de hacer estudiar a sus hijos y darle un techo en donde vivir. Su xito atribuye a la perseverancia, y tambin la buena administracin que ella misma le da a su negocio. Necesita el crdito para construir una habitacin al lado de su vivienda para as poder traer a su madre a vivir con ella y de esa forma volver a trabajar juntas en la elaboracin de las artesanas ya que ella est viviendo actualmente en una compaa a 20 Km. de la ciudad de Carapegu.

loan.use: Construccin de una habitacin adicional en su casa.

loan.name: Estilia Noemi

texts.es:
Estilia Noem is 43 years old and she sells fruit juices in a small restaurant in the market in the city of Bellavista, in the department of San Martn. She decided to start this business based on the experience she gained as an employee in a similar business. Her business has grown considerably. She has gained the trust of her customers and is recognized for her delicious juices. This business is the main source of income for her family.

She has two daughters who live in the city of Chiclayo, where they are going to school. Her husband helps her in the business. She very much likes sewing and has plans to open a seamstress shop in the future.

Estilia Noem belongs to the Mujeres Cumplidas Communal Bank, which is associated with Movimiento Manuela Ramos. She has requested S/. 2,000.00 ($650.00), with which she will buy a new blender that has several speed settings and a cooler for transporting and conserving fresh fruits. She will also replace her serving dishes (glasses, glass pitchers, plates, silver ware) and buy a color television so that customers can be entertained while they enjoy their delicious juices.

Translated from Spanish by Jennifer Day, Kiva Volunteer.

La seora Estilia Noem tiene 43 aos y se dedica a la venta de jugos de frutas en un puesto del campo ferial de la ciudad de Bellavista, Departamento de San Martn. Decidi iniciarse en este negocio a raz de la experiencia adquirida al haber sido ayudante en un negocio similar. En la actualidad su negocio ha crecido considerablemente, ganndose la confianza de los clientes, siendo reconocida por sus deliciosos jugos, actividad que es el principal ingreso econmico de su familia. Tiene 2 hijas, las cuales por motivos de estudios viven en la ciudad de Chiclayo, su esposo la apoya en el negocio, una de sus aficiones es la costura y tiene como proyecto personal poner un taller de costura mas adelante. Pertenece al Banco Comunal "Mujeres Cumplidas" promovido por Manuela Ramos y ha solicitado S/. 2,000.00 ( $650.00 ) con lo que comprar una nueva licuadora de varias velocidades, un recipiente trmico para transportar y conservar las frutas frescas, renovar toda la vajilla (vasos, jarras de vidrio, platos, cubiertos) adems de un televisor a colores para ambientar su local, para que sus clientes tengan con que entretenerse mientras disfrutan sus deliciosos jugos.

loan.use: To buy kitchen equipment and serving dishes

loan.name: Leongina

texts.es:
Leongina is 71 years old and married with three children: 2 daughters and a son, all married now. She and her husband work selling cow's milk and goat's milk. They have worked in this business since 1982; they both come from farm families, from whom they learned the business.

After marrying, they decided to start their own business, and so they bought a Dutch milk cow. Leongina used to travel to the city every day by bus to sell the milk. She tells the story of the difficult times she's had to get through just to keep the business going, how she didn't let those difficult times get the best of her, and how she and her husband fought together to overcome the difficulties. They succeeded in moving the business ahead and have gone on to increase their production, thanks to their dedication and their good management of their resources.

Currently, they own a well equipped facility and a small truck in which they deliver and sell their products.

Leongina is applying for a loan with which to buy the plot of land located in front of her business. She will use the land to grow crops she'll use to feed her cattle.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Corcoran, Kiva volunteer.

Doa Leongina tiene 71 aos de edad ella est casada y tiene tres hijos; dos mujeres y un slo varn todos ya casados. Ella y su esposo se dedican a la venta de leche de vaca y cabra, desde el ao 1982, ya que ambos provienen de familias que se dedicaban a la granja y de ah aprendieron como desarrollar la actividad.

Despus de casarse decidi independizarse y comenz con la compra de una vaca lechera holandesa, la seora Leongina viajaba todos los das a la ciudad en colectivo para vender la leche. Ella nos comenta que tuvo que pasar por momentos difciles para sostener el negocio no se dejaron vencer y lucho con su esposo, as lograron salir adelante y fueron aumentando su produccin gracias a la dedicacin y a la buena administracin de ambos administracin de sus recursos.

Actualmente, ya poseen un establecimiento bien equipado para un apropiado desenvolvimiento de su actividad, adems una camioneta para realizar el traslado y la venta de su producto.

Solicita el prstamo para adquirir un terreno que est ubicado frente a su establecimiento, para poder cultivar alimentos para el cuidado de su ganado vacuno.

loan.use: Buy a plot of land

loan.name: Martir

texts.es:
Mrs. Mrtir C. is 53 years old. She is a single mother and has two children. She works hard making cakes and has done this for more than 30 years. She learned from her mother and grandmother who taught her how to make different kinds of cakes, especially those with fruits. Her small business is located in a busy area as it is on Route 2, an intersection of various cities. Inevitably, many people stop by to purchase fruits and cakes that are sold there. In the summertime, Mrtir does not sell cakes but seeks other ways to make money to cover her family's living costs. Then she supplements her cake sales by selling fruits and iced beverages. She wishes to buy a variety of products to sell like honey, bananas, apples, papaya, etc. and seeks a loan of $275.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Volunteer.

La seora Mrtir C. tiene 53 aos, ella es madre soltera y tiene 2 hijos, se dedica a la elaboracin de dulces artesanales hace ms de 30 aos, stos conocimientos los hered de su madre y abuela quienes le ensearon como elaborar los dulces de distintas variedades, preferentemente de las frutas de estacin. Su pequeo negocio est ubicado en un lugar de mucha concurrencia ya que esta al costado de la ruta 2 que une varias ciudades, y las personas que viajan hacen una parada obligatoria para comprar dulces y frutas de los vendedores que estn ah. Mrtir, comenta que en la poca de verano cesa ms la venta de dulces, por lo que ella busca otras alternativas de generar recursos para cubrir sus necesidades y la de su familia, entonces complementa sus ventas de dulces con la venta de frutas y bebidas heladas. Desea comprar ms variedad de productos para vender como miel, bananas, manzanas, mamn (papaya), etc. por ello solicita un crdito de $ 275 para la compra de los mismos.

loan.use: To buy peanuts, honey, papaya, etc.

loan.name: Blanca Petra

texts.es:
Bianca is a hard-working woman with a 12-year-old son. Sadly, her husband died shortly after their son was born. Out of the necessity to keep her family moving forward and provide for her son, Blanca, as an enterprising woman, opened her own convenience store. She started with few products, but thanks to her nose for sales and the good service she provides she soon was successful in increasing her selection.

Currently, Blanca is requesting a loan of $925, which she will use to increase her supplies and meet her clients' demands. She plans to repay the loan within four months. Today you can help those who need it most and be a part of Blanca's success. Thank you for your support.

Translated from Spanish by Marty Greenstein, Kiva Volunteer

Blanca es una mujer muy trabajadora y tiene un hijo de 12 aos de edad, lamentablemente su esposo muri al poco tiempo de haber nacido su hijo. Ante la necesidad de sacar adelante a su hijo y darle los cuidados necesarios, como Blanca es una mujer emprendedora, inici su propio negocio con la venta de abarrotes, comenz con muy poca inversin pero gracias a su gusto por las ventas y al buen servicio que ofrece pronto logr incrementar la variedad de productos que ofrece.

En estos momentos Blanca necesita un prstamo de $ 925 dlares que se compromete a regresar en 4 meses, con esto espera poder surtir mejor su negocio y cubrir todas las necesidades de sus clientes. Hoy puedes ayudar a quien ms lo necesita, forma parte de los logros de Blanca, muchas gracias por tu apoyo.

loan.use: Purchase supplies

loan.name: Rosalinda

texts.es:
Rosalinda is married and has two children who are 9 and 17 years old. They have been the reason for her to start her own business fifteen years ago. Her husband is a merchant and does not have a stable income. To support her family and improve their lives, Rosalinda started to sell groceries in her home, a little after she set up one of the rooms. Due to good service, her business has grown.

To continue with good service and to increase the variety of products, Rosalinda is currently seeking a loan of $925 which she promises to pay back in 4 months. The well-being of this family is in your hands - make a decision to support Rosalinda. She is grateful for your help.

Translated from Spanish by Geraldine Kim, Kiva Volunteer.

Rosalinda es casada y tiene dos hijos de 9 y 17 aos de edad, ellos han sido el motivo por el cual inici su negocio hace quince aos, su esposo es comerciante y no tiene un ingreso seguro, para apoyarlo con los gastos del hogar y mejorar la calida de vida de su familia Rosalinda comenz a vender productos de abarrotes en su casa, poco despus acondicion una de las habitacin y gracias al buen servicio que ofrece ha estado creciendo con su negocio.

Para brindar un buen servicio e incrementar la variedad de sus productos ahora Rosalinda necesita un prstamo de $ 925 dlares, mismos que se compromete a regresar en 4 meses. En tus manos esta el bienestar de esta familia, decdete a apoyar a Rosalinda, ella agradece mucho tu confianza y apoyo.

loan.use: To buy more merchandise

loan.name: Gilberto

texts.es:
Business Description

Gilberto has 5 years of experience owning his own business. Since he was young he has enjoyed working. He began by selling seafood with the help of a friend. Together with his daughter he rents a sapce where they began selling foods. They work Monday through Saturday from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m, and his energy helps him keep his business going. The business is locatied in the commercial sector where there is high demand, and people come looking for them because of the great flavors his daughter is able to cook up.

Loan Use

This loan is being requested so that Gilberto can make improvements to his business space. He plans to purchase a door and a small piece of glass window where he hopes to sell ceviches and empanadas. He is also hoping to install an air conditioner is the eating area of his restaurant, in order to improve the service he provides to his clients.

Personal Information

Gilberto is 48 years old and has 3 children. The youngest is is school, and the other 2 are working. His daughter works with him, and is also studying at the university. She wants to be an architect. Gilberto has been seperated from his wife for 2 years. He is an example for his children, of whom he is very proud. In his house he has been able to contruct a space to run his business. He also hopes to sell during the weekends, and he wishes for help to realize his dreams.

Translated from Spanish by a Kiva Volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

Gilberto tiene una experiencia de 5 aos con su negocio propio. Desde joven le ha gustado trabajar. Se inicio con la venta de mariscos por medio de un amigo. Junto a su hija alquilaron un local donde empezaron con la venta de comida. Trabajan de lunes a sbado en horario de 8 a.m. hasta las 7pm. Ha podido mantener los dos negocios con su esfuerzo. Esta ubicado en un sector comercial donde tiene buena demanda. La gente lo busca por la sazn que le da su hija a sus platos.

Uso del Prstamo

El crdito lo solicita para poder adecuar su local. Comprar una puerta de vidrio y una vitrina pequea. En la que piensa vender corviches, empanadas. Posee un aire acondicionado el que lo piensa instalar en su local. Mejorando de esta manera el servicio a sus clientes.

Informacin Personal

Gilberto tiene 48 aos y 3 hijos. El menor de ellos estudia. Y los otros dos ya trabajan .Una es su hija que adems tambin estudia en la universidad. Sigue la carrera de arquitectura. Esta separado de su esposa hace dos aos. El se ha convertido en el ejemplo para sus hijos. Los que estn orgullosos. En su casa ha podido construir un local. Piensa en el tambin vender encocado los fines de semana. Espera con la inversin poder cumplir sus sueos.

loan.use: To make improvements to his business space

loan.name: Ganine

texts.es:
Business Description

Ganine and her husband have 25 years of experience in vehicle repair. She was able to learn some things about vehicle repair, and later her husband was the one who acquired greater knowledge, since from the age of 12 he worked along with a friend. At present, he has a workshop located in their home, where he also provides employment for one of his children, who already knows the trade, as well as for two other people. He works every day of the week from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m.

Loan Use

The loan is requested to invest in the purchase of spare parts for cars. At present they just repair the vehicle without replacing any of the parts. What they want is to have the spare parts on hand, which will improve the service they offer.

Personal Information

Ganine is 39 years old and has 4 children, including 3-year-old twins. Her house is of mixed construction (part concrete, part cane). In the future, she plane to start a car-washing business. She hopes with this investment that she will be able to improve her income and meet the goals she has in mind.

(Translated from the Spanish by Naomi Johnson, Kiva volunteer)

Descripcin del Negocio

Ganine junto a su esposo tienen ya una experiencia de 25 aos con el servicio de reparacin de vehculos. Ella pudo aprender en parte la reparacin de los vehculos. Luego de esto su esposo fue la persona que adquiri mayor conocimiento ya que desde la edad de 12 aos trabajaba junto a un amigo. Actualmente tiene un taller ubicado en su domicilio. Del que le da trabajo a uno de sus hijos que ya sabe el oficio. Adems de 2 personas conocidos de el. Trabaja todos los das de la semana en horario de 7 a.m. hasta las 6 p.m.

Uso del Prstamo

El crdito lo solicita para invertir en la compra de repuestos de carros. Actualmente ellos solo realizan la reparacin del vehiculo sin poner ningn repuesto. Lo que desean es poder tener los repuestos a mano con el que mejoraran el servicio que en este momento ofrece.

Informacin Personal

Ganine tiene 39 aos. Y 4 hijos. Tiene 2 gemelos de 3 aos. Su casita es de construccin mixta. Ha solicitado crdito con el que poco a poco esta terminando su casita de cemento. A futuro espera montar un negocio de lavadoras de autos. Espera con la inversin que realizara poder mejorar sus ingresos. Y cumplir con sus objetivos que tiene en mente.

loan.use: To buy spare parts for cars.

loan.name: Viviana

texts.es:
Mrs. Viviana G. is 27 years old and a beautician. She is the single mother of a little girl named Sofia who is 3 years old. She has worked in this field for 15 years. She tells us that she worked for a long time at a beauty salon which was not in a good economic situation, and because of all that Viviana was brave enough to take the risk of buying it. Today she is the owner of the salon and has a very good clientele. Thanks to the good location and her excellent work, she has been able to get ahead and generate good income in her business. She does hairstyles, cuts, manicures, and more. She hopes in the future to continue progressing and also offer services like massage, hair removal, makeup, skin cleaning, etc. She is requesting this loan for $1000.00 to be able to buy equipment such as curling irons, straightening irons, new hair dryers, and an electric wax heater for hair removal, in order to expand and improve her services in that way.

(Translated from the Spanish by Naomi Johnson, Kiva volunteer)

La seora Viviana G., tiene 27 aos, es peluquera, madre soltera de una nia de nombre Sofa que tiene 3 aos de edad. Se dedica a esta actividad hace 15 aos, nos comenta que fue empleada por mucho tiempo de la una peluquera, la misma no pasaba por una buena situacin econmica, y a pesar de todo ello, Viviana, tuvo la valenta de arriesgarse a comprarla. Hoy da ella es duea de la peluquera y posee muy buena clientela. Gracias a la buena ubicacin y a su excelente trabajo ha podido sacar adelante y generar buenas ganancias en su negocio. Ella realiza peinados, cortes, manicuras entre otros. Desea el da de maana poder seguir progresando y brindar tambin servicios de masajes, depilacin, maquillaje, limpieza de cutis, etc. Solicita el prstamo de $ 1.000 para poder comprar equipos ms modernos como rizadores de pelo, planchitas, secadores nuevos, y un calentador elctrico de cera para depilados de manera a ampliar y mejorar sus servicios como.

loan.use: To buy equipment such as curling irons, straightening irons, new hair dryers, and an electric wax heater.

loan.name: Mery

texts.es:
Business Description

Mery has three years of experience in her business. She started her business with the help of a friend who supplied the products that Mery sells. She has decided to make her own capital investments. Her business is doing very well and she has many customers in her area. Mery works every day of the week from 9 a.m. until 5 p.m. On the weekend she also prepares food that she sells, including local specialties such as encebollado, morochos, and pastries. Her daughter helps her with the business.

Loan Use

Mary will use the loan to purchase costume jewelry and cosmetics for her business. She hopes that in the future she will be able to purchase a showcase where she can display her merchandise.

Personal Information

Mery is 34 years old and has two children. She is a single mother. Thanks to her hard work, she has been able to give them a good education. They are very happy with the efforts of their mother and in their free time they help her out with the business. As can be seen in the photo, their house is made of cane and consists of one living area. Mery hopes to partition the space and convert it to a cement structure.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Kenney Molloy, Kiva volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

Mery tiene una experiencia de 3 aos con su actividad. Se inicio con la ayuda de una amiga la cual le provea los productos para que ella vendiera. Decide tener su propio capital y lo invierte. Le ha ido muy bien con el negocio captando muchos clientes dentro de su sector. Trabaja todos los das de la semana en horario de 9 a.m. hasta las 5 p.m. Los fines de semana se dedica tambin a la elaboracin de comida para su venta como lo es encebollado, Morochos, pasteles. Recibe la ayuda de su hija mayor en sus negocios.

Uso del Prstamo

El crdito lo invertir en compra de bisutera y cosmticos para su negocio. Espera a futuro poder comprarse una vitrina donde pueda exhibir sus productos.

Informacin Personal

Mery tiene 34 aos y dos hijos. Es madre soltera. Ha logrado gracias a su trabajo darle una buena educacin. Ellos estn contentos con el esfuerzo de su mama. Que en sus das libres le ayudan con la atencin de sus negocios. Su casita es de caa y viven en un solo ambiente. Su deseo es poder realizar divisiones dentro de su hogar y construirla de cemento.

loan.use: Purchase a larger supply of cosmetics

loan.name: Luz

texts.es:
Business Description

Sra. Luz V. has a small store where she sells basic essentials. She started this business with savings from wages earned by her husband four years ago. Their daughters assist them in the shop.

Loan Use

Sra. V. will use this loan to purchase more merchandise at wholesale prices. She also wants to make some improvements to the space where her store is located

Personal Information

Sra. V. is 51 years old and has two children who are students. She has a stable family and her house is constructed from mixed materials. Her primary goal is to be able to increase her business so that she can be assured of being able to provide an education for her children.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Kenney Molloy, Kiva volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

La Sra. Luz V. tiene una pequea despensa donde vende todo tipo de Productos de primera necesidad, este negocio lo inicio con unos ahorros que hizo su esposo producto de un trabajo que realizo hace cuatro aos. En el negocio le ayudan sus hijas

Uso del Prstamo

Ella necesita el crdito para realizar mas comprar de mercadera a precio de mayorista y quiere adems realizar unas adecuaciones en el local donde tiene ubicada la despenda

Informacin Personal

Ella tiene 51 aos y dos hijos que estudian su casa es de construccin mixta y tiene estabilidad familiar. Su principal meta es de poder progresar en su negocio para asegurar la educacin de sus hijos

loan.use: Purchase more merchandise for her shop

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To purchase medicine and beauty products at wholesale prices

loan.name: Virginia

texts.es:
Mrs. Virginia B., 62, was widowed seven years ago. She has three grown children, all with families of their own. She lives alone in her own house and runs a business selling fabric of various types as well as accessories for various types of clothing.

She used to run this business with her husband. When he died after forty years of being together, her grief affected her ability to run her business. But after a few years, she began to regain the strength and courage to keep fighting and in this way make her business prosper.

She has always lived in the city of Encarnacin. Her two daughters live and work in the capital city of Asuncin, where they are raising their families. Her 42-year-old son lives in the same city as she does and is always nearby.

She has been in this business more than 16 years. She knows the market and has an established client base in spite of the difficulties she has lived through. She is eager to advance her business and needs some capital to give the business she started with her husband a boost.

She is asking for a loan of $1000 so that she can stock fabric, feathers, sequins, and similar merchandise.

Translated from Spanish by Antonio and Sarah Padial, Kiva Volunteers

La Seora Virginia (62 aos) es viuda desde hace 7 aos, tiene 3 hijos mayores, todos independientes y con sus respectivas familias. Vive sola en su casa propia y lleva adelante un negocio de venta de telas de diferentes tipos, adems de accesorios para trajes diversos. Este negocio lo llevaba adelante con su marido, pero cuando l falleci, luego de haber compartido 40 aos de matrimonio con Doa Virginia, la angustia que le qued afecto el funcionamiento del negocio. Despus de unos aos fue tomando nuevamente fuerzas para seguir luchando y as llevar adelante su microempresa. Su residencia siempre ha sido en la ciudad de Encarnacin, 2 de sus hijas estn en la ciudad capital de Asuncin trabajando y formando su familia en esa ciudad, su hijo de 42 aos vive en la misma cuidad que ella y la acompaa permanentemente. Ella se dedica a este ramo hace ms de 16 aos, conoce el mercado y tiene una clientela formada a pesar de las dificultades personales que vivi. Tiene muchas ganas de seguir llevando adelante su negocio, y necesita un poco de capital para impulsar la empresa que empez con su marido. El prstamo solicitado de $ 1000, es para la compra de mercaderas: telas, plumas, lentejuelas y otros.

loan.use: To buy fabric, sequined cloth, feathers, etc., for dance outfits.

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: To purchase merchandise at wholesale prices

loan.name: Silvia

texts.es:
Business Description

Ms. Silvia has a small store that she runs with her husband. It was her husband who suggested that they open the store after he found himself without work. Nowadays, they not only run the store but they also have placed three telephone booths in their business where all types of calls can be made.

.

Loan Use

They will use the loan to purchase more merchandise for the store. Also, they wish to purchase cards for reloading minutes onto cell phones, which are very much in demand in businesses that offer telephone services.

Personal Information

Silvia is 31 years old and has three children, two of whom are in school. They have a stable family life and a house made out of cement. Her primary goal is to have a private school serving her community.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Kenney Molloy, Kiva volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

La Sra. Silvia tiene una despensa que administra junto con su esposo quien fue el que le propuso que pusieran ese negocio a raz de que se quedo sin empleo. Actualmente no solo tiene la despensa sino que adems han logrado poner un locutorio donde tiene tres cabinas para realizar llamadas de toda ndole,

.

Uso del Prstamo

Ellos necesitan el crdito para comprar mas mercadera para la tienda adems necesitan comprar tarjetas para recargar minutos en los celulares pues son muy solicitadas el la zona por el servicio que ellos prestan

Informacin Personal

Ella tiene 31 aos y tres hijos de los cuales dos estudia su casa es de cemento y tiene estabilidad familiar. Su principal meta poder tener una unidad educativa al servicio de su comunidad

loan.use: Purchase more merchandise and prepaid cellular phone cards

loan.name: Francisco

texts.es:
Business Description

Mr. Francisco has a grocery store which he opened 4 years ago. Currently her wife helps him since she joined efforts with him after loosing her job. Besides his grocery store, Francisco also sells fish by peddling in the mornings.

Credit use

He needs the credit in order to purchase more merchandise at wholesale prices and to purchase a freezer. The freezer he currently owns is now not large enough to keep all the fish he sells.

Personal Information

He is 32 years old and his 2 children go to school. His house is made of cement, but a part of it has not been finished. His main goal is to save to be able to finish his house and guarantee an education for his children.

Translated from Spanish by Luis Lpez Martinelli, Kiva Volunteer.


Descripcin del Negocio

Don Francisco tiene una despensa que la comenz hace cuatro aos, en la actualidad su esposa le ayuda pues despus de quedar desempleada aun esfuerzos para sacar adelante el negocio. Adems de la despensa el tambin vende pescado de forma ambulante en las maanas.

Uso del Prstamo

El necesita el crdito para comprar mas mercadera a precio de mayorista y para poder comprar un congelador y as poder guardar el pescado que el vende pues el que tiene actualmente no le abastece.

Informacin Personal

El tiene 32 aos y 2 hijos que estudian su casa es de cemento pero aun le falta una parte por terminar. Su meta principal es ahorrar para as poder terminar su casa y asegurar la educacin de sus hijos

loan.use: Investing in merchandise at wholesale prices

loan.name: Anonymous
loan.use: Buy her merchandise wholesale

loan.name: Audelith

texts.es:
Business Description

Doa Audelith is dedicated to sell refreshing beverages like: water, flavored waters, different colas and others. She has been working on this type of activity for 4 years. Her business is located at her home and she tends to it from 8 am until 8 p.m. every day of the week. Thanks to this effort she has been able to maintain and continue her business.

Loan Use

Audelith needs the loan to provide her business with facilities where the customers can sit. Most of the loan will be invested on tables and chairs. Also, due to the volume that her business has reach in terms of customers, Audelith is in need of expanding her business to serve her customers in a comfortable place and keep them happy.

Personal Information

Presently, Audelith is 46 years old and lives with her husband. Her husband is a great help for her at the business as well as in the house. They also have 2 grown-up children that don't live with them because they are independent. Audelith's hopes to move her business forward and expand it more. That way she can increase her capital for her own benefit and progress and help her family.

Translated from Spanish by Maria Ramirez-Gregg, Kiva Volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

Dona Audelith se dedica a la venta de bebidas refrescantes como: aguas, colas en diferentes presentaciones y tambin bebidas refrescantes. Teniendo como experiencia 4 aos, trabajando en este tipo de actividad, ya que el negocio lo tiene ubicado en su domicilio atendiendo desde las 8am hasta las 8pm, todos los das de la semana, en la que gracias a su propio esfuerzo a podido mantenerse en el negocio.

Uso del Prstamo

Audelith necesita el prstamo para adecuar el negocio, en lo que tiene que ver con la compra de utensilios como sillas y mesas. Adems por el nivel de clientela que ha llegado a tener, Audelith se ve en la necesidad de ampliar su negocio, para de esa manera tener a sus clientes conformes y contentos.

Informacin Personal

En la actualidad Audelith tiene 46 aos de edad, en donde vive junto a su esposo que le es gran ayuda en el hogar y en el negocio tambin, adems tienen 2 hijos pero ambos de mayora de edad, pero no viven con ellos ya que son independientes. Los anhelos de Audelith es salir con su negocio adelante y extenderlo mucho ms y as incrementar su capital, por el bienestar y progreso de si misma.

loan.use: Invest on tables and chairs so her customers can sit and enjoy their refreshments.

loan.name: Ivonne

texts.es:
Business Description

Mrs. Ivonne B. manufactures cabinetry and other furniture. Her shop is located at the rear of her home. She tends to clients from eight in the morning to six in the afternoon. She manufactures chests of drawers in laurelwood and pine. She has five years of experience in this business and works alongside her husband.

Purpose of the Loan

She would use the loan to buy more lumber. The demand for chests of drawers has increased, and she would like to meet client orders. Her funiture is well finished, and the demand is growing.

About the Applicant

Our friend Ivonne is 33. She has three children, who attend school. Her husband helps her in the business, and she would like the loan in order to meet client orders and expand her business. In addition to her cabinetry business, she runs a small store where she sells household supplies, and she would use part of the loan to stock the store with more staples. Her one-story house is of cane and has an earthen floor. Ivonne told us that her dream is to increase her business and build a more secure cement block house for her family and business.

Translated from Spanish by Antonio Padial, Kiva Volunteer

Descripcin del Negocio

Dona Ivonne tiene taller de ebanistera. Ubicado en su domicilio en la parte de atrs de la casa. Su atencin a los clientes es de 8: AM a 18: PM labora todos los das de la semana. Su produccin es elaborar cmodas, en madera de laurel y pino. Su experiencia es desde hace 5 aos. Trabaja junto con su esposo.

Uso del Prstamo

Ivonne solicita crdito para comprar mas madera. Su demanda de cmodas ha crecido y necesita cumplir con sus clientes. Sus productos tienen un buen acabado por lo que le estn solicitando mas cmodas.

Informacin Personal

Nuestra amiga Ivonne tiene 33 aos y 3 hijos, ellos estn estudiando. Su esposo la ayuda en el negocio e indica que le gustara mucho que sea considerada con un crdito. Para as de esta manera cumplir con sus clientes y poder seguir creciendo con su negocio. Adicional a este negocio de Ebanistera Ivonne posee una pequea Tienda donde vende vveres y tambin necesita invertir para surtirla con ms productos. Su casa es de caa y tiene piso de tierra. Ivonne nos dice que su sueo es incrementar mas sus negocios y de esta manera poder construir su vivienda de cemento para dar mayor seguridad a su familia y negocio.

loan.use: To buy lumber

loan.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Business Description

Rosas business is located in her home. She sells all types of provisions from the coast and the mountains: rice, sugar, meat, chicken, vegetables and more. She attends to clients from 6:00 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. every day of the week.

Loan Use

Rosa is requesting a loan to purchase more merchandise. Sales have increased and she wants keep up with customer demand. Rosas sales are up because of the good service she provides to her clients and the variety of products she offers.

Personal Information

Rosa is 34 years old. She has two daughters who are in school. Rosa is a single mother whose husband abandoned her six years ago. Since that time her business is their only source of income. Her house is of mixed construction with a dirt floor. Rosas desire is to see her business continue to grow and to be able to continue the construction of and improvements to her home, little by little, so that she can provide greater security to her family and her business.

Translated from Spanish by Ann Kenney Molloy, Kiva volunterr

Descripcin del Negocio

Rosa tiene su negocio de Tienda ubicado en su domicilio. Rosa vende toda clase de vveres de costa y sierra: Arroz. Azcar, Carnes, Pollo, Legumbres y otros. La atencin a los clientes es de 6: AM a 22: PM labora todos los das de la semana.

Uso del Prstamo

Rosa solicita crdito para comprar mas producto. Su demanda ha crecido y necesita cumplir con sus clientes. Su demanda ha aumentado debido a la atencin que ella brinda y a la variedad de productos que ofrece.

Informacin Personal
